div.a: CIS shares important information with parents, students

span.span: Here is some important information to share with all students and parents.

p.font: CIS will remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.span: Please check in with us by clicking HERE.

a.title: Click to read more about: CIS shares important information with parents, students

div.a: Read More about CIS shares important information with parents, students
CES to host kindergarten registration week May 4-8

span.span: Campbellsville Elementary School will host registration the week of May 4 for students entering kindergarten in the 2020-2021 school year.
To enroll, children must be 5 years old on or before Aug. 1.
Parents should submit registration paperwork, which is accessible online, during the week of May 4.

a.title: Click to read more about: CES to host kindergarten registration week May 4-8

div.a: Read More about CES to host kindergarten registration week May 4-8
CES teachers, staff members visit their students in parades

span.span: Campbellsville Elementary School teachers and staff members recently visited their students in parades.
Teachers and staff members drove three routes on three days to wave and say hello to their students.
They decorated their vehicles with signs, balloons and banners.

img.alt: CES teachers visit their students in a parade around town.

a.title: Click to read more about: CES teachers, staff members visit their students in parades

div.a: Read More about CES teachers, staff members visit their students in parades
